participant_abstract.sent: The prototype was presented in a clear fashion and all participants agreed that the liked it.
The cost of the prototype was well under the set limit, however, the speech recognition unit was not yet included in this.
The ME presented a point system for the various features like shape, size, colour, feel and functionality.
All were on total agreement on shape and colour, the other items were judged differently by each participant.
We all agreed that we are satisfied with this new remote control and that the voice recognition feature and the colours were our strong points for marketing.

participant_decisions.sent: The prototype is ready to be tested on the market.
First by potential consumers and secondly it should be shown to consumer research groups to make sure that there are problems with any of the materials, shape, etc.

participant_problems.sent: We could not include the cost for the voice recognition feature, but decided that the remaining Euro 4.30 will more than cover that.
